attributes.action: Call for a new General election
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to prove they have the support of the nation as I feel there's no confidence in the current government and a general election would let the nation speak
attributes.background:
I feel the current government have lost support of the nation .
It's time for the nation to speak

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
